{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RP-N12.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless-N300 Range Extender/Access Point/Media Bridge |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN12/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_RP-N12 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = RP-N12 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = A1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 21, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RP-N12 |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = access point, range extender, media bridge |sernum = |fcc_id = MSQ-RPN12 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628N; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 580 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q32FVS1G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9412G6KH-5; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 1C:87:2C |oui = 1C:87:2C |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.1 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P |serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_RPN12 |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan ? |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/23/2015 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B013LKLK2M |asin_country = US |asin2 = B00YSL9H92 |asin_country2 = DE |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *External antenna enhances Wi-Fi signal coverage and boosts your Wi-Fi everywhere *Quick and secure setup via a press of the WPS button *Smart LED signal indicator helps you find the best location for optimum Wi-Fi performance *Roaming Assist helps you to get a stable connection everywhere in the home or office ===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11b/g/n 2T2R :N300: 300Mbps (2.4GHz, 20/40MHz) *Antenna: 2x 2dBi fixed external antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: :AC Input : 100~240V (50/60Hz) 0.1A :DC Output : 5V with max 1A current *Dimensions: 81 x 55 x 34 mm (LxWxH) *Weight: 110 g ==Links of Interest== ===Misc=== *[http://www.MediaTek.com/en/news-events/MediaTek-news/MediaTek-launches-mt7628-industrys-first-80211n-2t2r-ap-soc-for-home-router-smart-router-and-iot-gateway/ MediaTek press release] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/198-asus-rp-n12.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7628N @580MHz (2T2R 802.11bgn) :Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q32FVS1G (4MB SPI) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W9412G6KH-5 (16MB DDR) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial===

==See also== * [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] ====Wireless Range Extender==== * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product Page] ====Wireless Router==== * [[ASUS RT-N54U]] N600 (300+300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN54U/ Product Page] * [[ASUS RT-N14U]] N300 (300Mbps) [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTN14U/ Product Page] [[Category:English Documentation]]
